page.description: Conditional style for a field in a List control

section.description: If you define a server-side in-line or conditional style for a field in a List control, then the server-side style is computed on the server and is included in a separate (hidden) field in the List data. The style is then applied on the client-side. The net result of this change is that when you read data from a field that has a server-side style, the data will not include any HTML markup.
